Web / Web Application



The projects are related to web frontend, backend and web application. My major skills includes Vue.js and Electron for frontend and Django and Django REST Framework for backend.

Table of Contents

1. Samsung, SoC/IP regression automation GUI


Description

This project has been motivated to develop web application for SoC/IP regression automation. To acheive the goal, the user interface has been developed with Vue.js and Electron, and backend server has been developed with Django REST Framework. I also designed REST API structure and developed both frontend and backend.

2. Cloudike, cloud company API web page


Description

This project has been motivated to develop a documetation and test web page for REST API in a cloud company. To acheive the goal, Sphinx was used to generate Python documentation pages, and statistics and test sections were also added for API monitoring and verfication.
